com.wookler.server.common

Annotation Type ServiceSpec


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ServiceSpec
    Path definition annotation for a service, analogous to REST service locator path.
    Author:
    Subho Ghosh (subho dot ghosh at outlook.com) 8:05:40 PM

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String path
      Service locator path.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      ServiceSpec.EServiceControl type
      Get the access control associated with this service.

    • Element Detail

      • path

        public abstract String path
        Service locator path.
        Returns:
        - Service Path.

      • type

        public abstract ServiceSpec.EServiceControl type
        Get the access control associated with this service.
        Returns:
        Default:
        com.wookler.server.common.ServiceSpec.EServiceControl.None
